title: "Top Stocks To Buy Now? 3 Tech Stocks For Your List"
excerpt: "Last week, Microsoft reported its fourth-quarter 2023 financial results. In detail, the tech giant announced earnings of $2.69 per share on revenue totaling $56.19 billion, exceeding the consensus earnings estimate of $2.54 per share on revenue of $55.44 billion. This result represents year-over-year revenue growth of 8.34%."
